net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl

Class VisualWordsImageSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.AbstractImageSearcher
      • net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl.VisualWordsImageSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageSearcher

    public class VisualWordsImageSearcher
extends AbstractImageSearcher
    Provides a general searcher for visual words implementation. Can be used for SIFT, SURF and MSER. Date: 28.09.2010 Time: 13:58:33 Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

        Returns:
